front.title: Generalization of iSER for SCTP, Infiniband and other Network Protocols

abstract.t: The iSCSI Extensions for RDMA document [iSER] currently specifies the RDMA data transfer capability for [iSCSI] over iWARP/TCP. This document generalizes the iSER document to permit it to be used with other RDMA capable protocols such as iWARP/SCTP, InfiniBand, etc. It also describes what should be defined in the InfiniBand Trade Association and what are appropriate for IETF.
